json.text:
The world will fall into a deep ruin
A place where there's no mercy

What is that you have learned by yourself
all this time?
As I was watching my dreams fade in the dark

What will I choose to keep with me?
What is that I could give up on?

Who do I think I am
to decide that on my own?

Any choice that I make
Is already decided

By somebody from above
Why they do that? I don't know

But I do know that I'm not alone
You are by my side wherever I go
That's why I'm not afraid anymore

Even if there is a monster in me, and
I know I'll make it through
